text: Arthur Thomas Hannett (February 17, 1884 â€“ March 18, 1966) was an American politician. He became the seventh Governor of New Mexico. After serving as a member of the State Highway Commission from March 1923, until December 1924, Hannett was elected Governor of New Mexico and served from January 1, 1925 until January 1, 1927. title: Arthur T. Hannett
